title: STOIK Video Enhancer,Stoik,Video Enhancer,TeamGBZ
description:
Fix exposure and color balance, pull shadows and repair clipped highlights in a few clicks!
STOIK Video Enhancer comes with a host of highly sophisticated video enhancement, upscaling, noise and blur reduction algorithms accessible in a click of a button.
Remove video shake and motion blur, clean up blotchy and grainy movies, and create crisp and detailed full HD footage out of an SD source!
With smart deinterlacing algorithms, you can produce progressive 480p, 720p or 1080p video from any source.
STOIK Video Enhancer makes it easy to fix common issues, upscale and enhance videos in just a few clicks.

Fix exposure and color balance errors in full auto mode.
Enhances videos shot with inexpensive camcorders.
Studio-like quality with motion-based processing.
Adaptive algorithms use information from neighbouring frames.
Pull shadows and fix blown highlights.
De-interlace videos.
Reduce video noise and grain.
Upscale SD sources to full HD.
Remove camera shake from unstabilized videos.
Remove motion and defocus blur.
Motion-based sharpening borrows sharp details from neighbouring frames.

Import and Export Capabilities

STOIK Video Enhancer supports videos in all sizes and resolutions and a variety of formats. It is perfect for making Web-sized video clips as well as preparing full HD media.
User Interface and Workflow

STOIK Video Enhancer offers an extremely straightforward user experience by introducing the convenient three-step workflow. The new workflow is quick, simple, and very easy to learn.
